TrueCar compiles and analyzes recent Kentucky sales transaction data which includes extensive exterior color, interior color, special packages, manufacturer and dealer installed options, and any manufacturer incentives for new 2016 Ford models. Many Kentucky Ford buyers prefer options such as Bluetooth hands free, a navigation system, alloy wheels, leather seats, heated seats, a DVD player, an MP3 player, a backup camera, LED and Xenon lights.
